description.name: wxrperc20
description.tagline: WXRP erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-wxrp Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept WXRP erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/wxrp receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/wxrp wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
